[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@mahadao/arth-base](./arth-base.md) &gt; [PopulatableARTH](./arth-base.populatablearth.md)

## PopulatableARTH interface

Prepare ARTH transactions for sending.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PopulatableARTH<R = unknown, S = unknown, P = unknown> extends _PopulatableFrom<SendableARTH<R, S>, P> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> \_PopulatableFrom&lt;[SendableARTH](./arth-base.sendablearth.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, S&gt;, P&gt;

## Remarks

The functions return an object implementing [PopulatedARTHTransaction](./arth-base.populatedarthtransaction.md)<!-- -->, which can be used to send the transaction and get a [SentARTHTransaction](./arth-base.sentarthtransaction.md)<!-- -->.

Implemented by [PopulatableEthersARTH](./arth-ethers.populatableethersarth.md)<!-- -->.

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [adjustTrove(params, maxBorrowingRate)](./arth-base.populatablearth.adjusttrove.md) | Adjust existing Trove by changing its collateral, debt, or both. |
|  [borrowARTH(amount, maxBorrowingRate)](./arth-base.populatablearth.borrowarth.md) | Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more ARTH. |
|  [claimCollateralSurplus()](./arth-base.populatablearth.claimcollateralsurplus.md) | Claim leftover collateral after a liquidation or redemption. |
|  [closeTrove()](./arth-base.populatablearth.closetrove.md) | Close existing Trove by repaying all debt and withdrawing all collateral. |
|  [depositARTHInStabilityPool(amount, frontendTag)](./arth-base.populatablearth.depositarthinstabilitypool.md) | Make a new Stability Deposit, or top up existing one. |
|  [depositCollateral(amount)](./arth-base.populatablearth.depositcollateral.md) | Adjust existing Trove by depositing more collateral. |
|  [liquidate(address)](./arth-base.populatablearth.liquidate.md) | Liquidate one or more undercollateralized Troves. |
|  [liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate)](./arth-base.populatablearth.liquidateupto.md) | Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number. |
|  [openTrove(params, maxBorrowingRate)](./arth-base.populatablearth.opentrove.md) | Open a new Trove by depositing collateral and borrowing ARTH. |
|  [redeemARTH(amount, maxRedemptionRate)](./arth-base.populatablearth.redeemarth.md) | Redeem ARTH to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value. |
|  [registerFrontend(kickbackRate)](./arth-base.populatablearth.registerfrontend.md) | Register current wallet address as a ARTH frontend. |
|  [repayARTH(amount)](./arth-base.populatablearth.repayarth.md) | Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt. |
|  [sendARTH(toAddress, amount)](./arth-base.populatablearth.sendarth.md) | Send ARTH tokens to an address. |
|  [sendMAHA(toAddress, amount)](./arth-base.populatablearth.sendmaha.md) | Send MAHA tokens to an address. |
|  [transferCollateralGainToTrove()](./arth-base.populatablearth.transfercollateralgaintotrove.md) | Transfer [collateral gain](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) from Stability Deposit to Trove. |
|  [withdrawARTHFromStabilityPool(amount)](./arth-base.populatablearth.withdrawarthfromstabilitypool.md) | Withdraw ARTH from Stability Deposit. |
|  [withdrawCollateral(amount)](./arth-base.populatablearth.withdrawcollateral.md) | Adjust existing Trove by withdrawing some of its collateral. |
|  [withdrawGainsFromStabilityPool()](./arth-base.populatablearth.withdrawgainsfromstabilitypool.md) | Withdraw [collateral gain](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [MAHA reward](./arth-base.stabilitydeposit.mahareward.md) from Stability Deposit. |
